thread.title: High School Roundup, 9/25/15

title: High School Roundup, 9/25/15
text: Steven King/Dispatch Billy Steve Casa Grande Union’s Billy Steve won the 200-yard freestyle and the 500 freestyle in Thursday’s meet against Westview. Posted: Friday, September 25, 2015 11:05 am High School Roundup, 9/25/15 Volleyball -- SAN TAN VALLEY — Casa Grande Union raised its record to 8-0 with a come-from-behind 3-2 victory over Poston Butte on Thursday night. Game scores were 25-18, 21-25, 22-25, 25-20, 18-16. The Cougars went into the match ranked No. 5 in Division III. Swimming -- AVONDALE — Billy Steve won two events for the Casa Grande Union boys, and Megan Koltz was a double winner for the Cougar girls in Thursday’s meet against Westview. The boys lost 93-75 and the girls also lost (the score was not available). Both teams are 1-2 on the season. Steve won the 200-yard freestyle in 2 minutes, 8.97 seconds, and the 500 free in 5:52.49. Also taking first were Jake Batina in the 100 breaststroke (1:09.80), David Koltz in the 100 butterfly (1:06.45), and the 200 free relay team of Batina, Chase Hubbard, Luke Vacca and Steve (1:47.57). Finishing second were Batina in the 50 free and Vacca in the 100 backstroke. Thirds went to Shaun Wyllie in the 100 butterfly, Austin LeMasters in the 100 free, Koltz in the 100 back and Hubbard in the 100 breast. Megan Koltz won the 50 free in 27.23 and the 500 free in 6:17.01. Brooke Steve finished first in the 100 breast (1:25.21), and the 200 free relay team of Koltz, Steve, April Wilson and Jessie Sanders won in 2:00.39. Sanders took second in the 200 free and 500 free, and Steve was second in the 100 back. Thirds went to Melanie Paytosh in the 200 individual medley and Gabbie Buchanan in the 100 back.
